ing: 1 cup peppermint mocha-flavored coffee liqueur (such as KahluaÂ®)
n: Quick and Easy Chocolate Mint Eggnog
des: "Quick and easy eggnog. Perfect for holiday parties and for gifts! You may garnish with whipped cream and crushed peppermint candy."
ins: Stir eggnog, chocolate syrup, coffee liqueur, and peppermint extract together in a large bowl with a whisk until smooth. Fold whipped topping through the eggnog mixture.
